paragraphs.content: Psalm 80
paragraphs.contentHtml: Psalm 80

paragraphs.content: To the chief Musician upon Shoshannim-Eduth, A Psalm of Asaph.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the chief Musician upon Shoshannim-Eduth, A Psalm of Asaph.

paragraphs.content: Give ear, O Shepherd of Israel, thou that leadest Joseph like a flock; thou that dwellest between the cherubims, shine forth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Give ear, O Shepherd of Israel, thou that leadest Joseph like a flock; thou that dwellest between the cherubims, shine forth.

paragraphs.content: Before Ephraim and Benjamin and Manasseh stir up thy strength, and come and save us.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Before Ephraim and Benjamin and Manasseh stir up thy strength, and come and save us.

paragraphs.content: Turn us again, O God, and cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Turn us again, O God, and cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.

paragraphs.content: O LORD God of hosts, how long wilt thou be angry against the prayer of thy people?
paragraphs.contentHtml: O Lord God of hosts, how long wilt thou be angry against the prayer of thy people?

paragraphs.content: Thou feedest them with the bread of tears; and givest them tears to drink in great measure.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou feedest them with the bread of tears; and givest them tears to drink in great measure.

paragraphs.content: Thou makest us a strife unto our neighbours: and our enemies laugh among themselves.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou makest us a strife unto our neighbours: and our enemies laugh among themselves.

paragraphs.content: Turn us again, O God of hosts, and cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Turn us again, O God of hosts, and cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.

paragraphs.content: Thou hast brought a vine out of Egypt: thou hast cast out the heathen, and planted it.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou hast brought a vine out of Egypt: thou hast cast out the heathen, and planted it.

paragraphs.content: Thou preparedst room before it, and didst cause it to take deep root, and it filled the land.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou preparedst room before it, and didst cause it to take deep root, and it filled the land.

paragraphs.content: The hills were covered with the shadow of it, and the boughs thereof were like the goodly cedars.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The hills were covered with the shadow of it, and the boughs thereof were like the goodly cedars.

paragraphs.content: She sent out her boughs unto the sea, and her branches unto the river.
paragraphs.contentHtml: She sent out her boughs unto the sea, and her branches unto the river.

paragraphs.content: Why hast thou then broken down her hedges, so that all they which pass by the way do pluck her?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Why hast thou then broken down her hedges, so that all they which pass by the way do pluck her?

paragraphs.content: The boar out of the wood doth waste it, and the wild beast of the field doth devour it.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The boar out of the wood doth waste it, and the wild beast of the field doth devour it.

paragraphs.content: Return, we beseech thee, O God of hosts: look down from heaven, and behold, and visit this vine;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Return, we beseech thee, O God of hosts: look down from heaven, and behold, and visit this vine;

paragraphs.content: And the vineyard which thy right hand hath planted, and the branch that thou madest strong for thyself.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the vineyard which thy right hand hath planted, and the branch that thou madest strong for thyself.

paragraphs.content: It is burned with fire, it is cut down: they perish at the rebuke of thy countenance.
paragraphs.contentHtml: It is burned with fire, it is cut down: they perish at the rebuke of thy countenance.

paragraphs.content: Let thy hand be upon the man of thy right hand, upon the son of man whom thou madest strong for thyself.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let thy hand be upon the man of thy right hand, upon the son of man whom thou madest strong for thyself.

paragraphs.content: So will not we go back from thee: quicken us, and we will call upon thy name.
paragraphs.contentHtml: So will not we go back from thee: quicken us, and we will call upon thy name.

paragraphs.content: Turn us again, O LORD God of hosts, cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Turn us again, O Lord God of hosts, cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.
